name: 魏正琪
objective: 學習化工製程所涉及的物料處理與輸送、分離程序及精製方法等各種物理變化的操作，期以經濟的方法設計並且有效的生產及操作化學工廠。本課程內容包括熱量傳送及其應用。
schedule:
1. Heat Transfer to Fluids without Phase Change(第1,2,3週)
2. Heat Transfer to Fluids with Phase Change(第4,5週)
3. Radiation Heat Transfer(第6,7週)
4. Heat-Exchange Equipment(第8,9,10週)
5. Evaporation(第11,12,13週)
6. Energy Transfer(第14,15,16週)
7. Equilibrium-Stage Operations & Distillation(第17週)
8. Final Exam(第18週)
scorePolicy:
作業     10%
平時成績　　30% (含月考)
期中考   30%
期末考   30%
materials:
1. McCabe, W. L., Smith, J. C. & Harriott, P., “Unit Operations of
Chemical Engineering”, 7th ed., McGraw-Hill Co., 2005.
2. Bird, R. B., Stewart, W. E. & Lightfoot, E. N., “Transport
Phenomena”, 2nd ed., John Wiley & Sons Co., 2002. (參考書)
3. 補充講義
